aadarsha tharangawaliyen anathuruwa nawaka kandayama ha aacharya mandalaya athara tharangayen krida tharangawaliya aarambha wuwa.in anathuruwa aacharya mandala kandayama, thewana wasara kandayama , dewana wasara kandayama , palamu wasar kandayama , nawaka kandayama , eka.shi.sa kandayama , aa.hu.sa kandayama , loweth amadyapa kandayama aadi kandayam rasak athara tharanga pawathuna.pradarshana tharangaya wenuwen kasiye wasiya uraga balime awasthawaaacharya mandalaya tharangayen jaya labimen anathuruwame tharangawaliyata niwedana katayuthuwalin sahaya une paralla ayiya samaga kala ayiya.

amaradewa palu game palu pale - ti. em. jayarathna, malani bulathsinhala royi royi royi – malani bulathsinhala namali kumari – malani bulathsinhala, niranjala sarojini palanda kadukasthana – em. es. pranandu saha pirisagitha poth - shanthi pothhala – maradananalu niliyan - reks kodippili (kadira) malini fonseka (namali) woli nanayakkara (ukkubanda) wina jayakodi (silindu) hiyugo pranandu (aarachchila) rathnawali kakunawela (manike) gamunu wijesuriya (weda mama) dharma shri munasinha (malhami mama) fe්radi silwa (pina) dewika karunarathna (biso) piyadasa wijekon (wadi nayaka) liliyan edirisinha (wadi nayikawa) es. ee. jemis (punchirala) kinsli disanayaka (undiya) ralp wijekon (handuna) dayananda salwathura, siri pathirana, champa arukgoda, saranapala jayasuriya, susila kuragama, mothilal gunasekara.pradarshanaya – elfinstan, impala, triyo, nashanal - maharagama, gamunu - waththala athulu 1 wana mandalaye sinama shala 15 kadi.pradarshana kalaya – mul shala 15 thulama dina 60 pirunu athara sinama shala 05 k thula dina 100 piruni.1980 pawathi 10 wana sarasawiya sammana ulele 79 wasare janapriyama chithrapataya lesa pataka chanda 45239 laba mul thanata pathwuna athara hondama gayanayata himisammanaya himi kara ganna ladi.-

jathyanthara kandukara dinaya yeduna desambar 11 wana dina sita prabhawa parisara sanwidhanaye kandu samarum anshaya magin pura masayaka kalayak pura kandu ha parisara surakim wadasatahan kriyathmaka kirimen anathuruwa mema kandu samarum uthsawaya ha prabhawa kandu tharanaya pawathwana ladi. 2002 wasare pawathi mihikatha samuluwe di gath yojanawakata anuwa sama warshayakama desambar masa 11 wana da loka kadukara dinaya lesa prakashayata pathkala athara masayak purawata kadu tharana, parisara surakime wadasatahan, kadukara pradesha sancharaka washayen prachalitha kirima wani wadasatahan sidukirimata lowa boho ratawala parisara sanwidhana piyawara gani.
